climatePledgeFriendly.details: Rainforest Alliance seal stands for more sustainable farming methods that help improve farmer livelihoods & mitigate climate change. The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Pack contains 6 Mega Rolls (242 Sheets Per Roll) of Charmin Ultra Strong Toilet Paper
Charmin Ultra Strong has washcloth like texture
4X stronger when wet to keep your hands and hiney clean (vs leading USA 1-ply bargain brand)
Made with a diamond weave texture
body.description: Get sparkly clean with Charmin Ultra Strong. It’s 4X stronger when wet* and has a diamond weave texture. It’s woven like a washcloth and holds up when you wipe. It even cleans better so you can use less* and go longer without changing the roll**. We also made it MEGA in size, so you get mega value. That’s right, our Charmin Ultra Strong Mega Roll is way bigger, equals 4 regular rolls, and it’s more bang for your behind so you’ll be running back to the store less and less (based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue). Our Charmin Ultra Strong toilet paper is also 2-ply and designed to be clog-safe and septic-safe so you can flush confidentially and keep clean. We all go, why not Enjoy The Go with America’s favorite toilet paper***. *vs. leading USA 1-ply bargain brand ** vs. Charmin Regular Roll ***Charmin Brand based on sales. Source: Nielsen 2021 dollar sales.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Try our Strongest Toilet Paper Ever! Get sparkly clean with Charmin Ultra Strong. It’s 4X stronger when wet* and has a diamond weave texture. It’s woven like a washcloth and it holds up when you wipe. It even cleans better so you can use less* and go longer without changing the roll**. We made it SUPER MEGA in size, so you get SUPER MEGA VALUE! That’s right, our Ultra Strong Super Mega Roll is way bigger – 1 super mega roll equals 6 regular rolls! It’s more bang for your behind so you’ll be running back to the store less and less***. Our Charmin Ultra Strong toilet paper is 2-ply and designed to be clog-safe and septic-safe so you can flush confidentially and keep clean. We all go, why not Enjoy The Go with America’s favorite toilet paper****. *vs. leading USA 1-ply bargain brand. ** vs. Charmin Regular Roll. ***based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue. ****Charmin Brand based on sales. Source: Nielsen 2021 dollar sales

Enjoy the Go with Charmin Ultra Strong Super Mega Roll Super Mega Roll = Super Mega Value! Charmin Ultra Strong Super Mega Roll has 6X the number of sheets as Charmin Regular Roll and was created to last longer for you and your family. Charmin Ultra Strong Super Mega lasts longer and is guaranteed to fit. Enjoy the go with Charmin Ultra Strong Super Mega Roll! Diamond Weave Texture We designed Charmin Ultra Strong Super Mega Roll with a unique diamond weave texture to leave you with an even cleaner touch than flat textured toilet paper could. Stay dry and enjoy a confident Charmin clean every time! Stock up on Ultra Strong! Staying stocked with Charmin Ultra Strong Super Mega Roll is now simpler than ever! Super Mega packs last longer* so you can go more and worry less! *vs. smaller count pack of Charmin Regular Roll.

Charmin Beyond The Roll Made with American Jobs Charmin is proudly manufactured in the USA. 100% of Charmin products are made with American jobs that support thousands of employees and their families. FSC Certified The forest is our home. So we’re committed to keeping it around by partnering with leading conservation organizations. Charmin Recycles 100% of Charmin finished product cores are made of FSC certified recycled material and can be recycled after use.

Reforestation For every tree used, we regrow two more. And we’re committed to zero deforestation practices for the health of our forests. Forest Restoration We partner with organizations like the Arbor Day Foundation to fund forest replenishment in areas devastated by natural disasters like wildfires. Protect, Grow and Restore. Charmin aims to keep forests as forests. 100% of our pulp comes from responsibly managed forests and other controlled wood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I had NO idea how great this stuff is!
reviews.reviewText: I never knew or believed that anyone could rave about a toilet paper product, of all things! However, this stuff is PERFECT! The seller offers a great price, ships fast and is really good. The product is amazing! It's priced well, is very soft yet incredibly strong. No more tearing at that crucial moment! I'll never buy another brand again. SOOO worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toilet paper on the market. Thick!
reviews.reviewText: don't you hate toilet paper that you have to practically use half the roll because it is so thin. This toilet paper is thick and strong so we use a lot less. Just wished (unlike some other major brands) they did not shrink the square sizes (rolls are not as tall/long as they used to be a few years ago).

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is good butt cleaner LOL
reviews.reviewText: Strong, decent price, soft. Next best thing to a bidet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toilet paper!
reviews.reviewText: This is our favorite toilet paper and the only one I will buy now. Package was smaller than I expected, but that's my fault for not paying more attention to the description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toilet paper
reviews.reviewText: I love this toilet paper. It is very strong and soft, and it cleans well. It has a nice texture and it does not tear easily. The super mega rolls are huge and last for a long time. I don't have to worry about running out of toilet paper or clogging the toilet. This is the best toilet paper I have ever used, and I highly recommend it to anyone who wants a quality product.
Es bien papel muy rendidor es lujoso caro para México
I ONLY USE CHARMIN TOILET TISSUE, IT'S THE BEST!
